description: Blackcomb base layers are the stars of our seamless range. This long sleeve crew neck version is made with 74 per cent recycled polyester. Collaboratively designed with Protect Our Winters Switzerland - an NGO committed to climate crisis awareness - it delivers unmatched range of motion, dries fast, breathes beautifully and insulates in cool weather. Finished with ZeroScent - a bio-based antibacterial treatment that limits odours - Blackcomb layers fit next to skin and are ideal for skiing, ski-touring, cross-country skiing and winter running. Feel free. Feel good.
name: BL Blackcomb Eco LS Crew Neck Top - Mens

specs.value: garments are cut close to the body. For a looser fit, they suggest you size up
